Quick follow up to version 2.0. Colors of drawing tools visible at all times Allow adjustment to the height of the schedule Fix an issue some users are seeing with customizing drawing tool colors Note: to change a color tap on it a second time Other minor bug fixes Please see our feature roadmap for upcoming features: https: pencilplanner.app roadmap If you have any questions or issues please email us at support pencilplanner.app

Welcome to version 2.0 of Pencil Planner Pro! Integration with the Apple Reminders app available on the V2 day tab V2 redesigned Day Week Month and Year tabs option to use new or old version Notes available to be edited from the day view Updated drawing tools integrated into the navigation bar Fixes for a series of bugs and issues Please see our feature roadmap for upcoming features: https: pencilplanner.app roadmap If you have any questions or issues please email us at support pencilplanner.app

Welcome to the latest Pencil Planner! We have a few exciting features available with this update: Text notes! with rich editing headers markup lists checklists etc. Link notes to days events Access linked notes from the day week month tabs Quick action buttons for creating notes and events Notes are automatically placed into the current folder and linked to today Fullscreen mode provided for calendar views Other new features: Event font size adjustment setting Increased line height options on notes A couple other minor bug fixes and features Please see our feature roadmap for upcoming features: https: pencilplanner.app roadmap If you have any questions or issues please email us at support pencilplanner.app

Introducing the Notes tab! You can now add hand written notes pin them and organize them within folders. Also: Edit your name email Free tier access the day tab and the month tab without a paid subscription A couple other account management actions are now available Several bug fixes for issues found by you! Look forward to additional releases coming soon. Please see our feature roadmap for upcoming features: https: pencilplanner.app roadmap If you have any questions or issues please email us at support pencilplanner.app

Some creepy crawlin bugs squashed friends. Thanks for the feedback! iPhone navigation issues Line contrast issues Pencil Planner is getting better every day! Please see our feature roadmap for upcoming features: https: pencilplanner.app roadmap If you have any questions or issues please email us at support pencilplanner.app

A quick update to fix a small bug! Following up an exciting update for you with many new features! Calendar events now displayed on the month view Week notes area and other week improvements Year grid added by half or quarter Redesigned sub tabs to fit more views iOS Split screen now supported multiple concurrent planner windows Several planner options provided including: Line height contrast paper mode Option to hide the Reflect pane Widened range for day start hour and end hour Reorganized settings menu Added translations for several more languages including French Portuguese And several more small features as well as several bugfixes! Please see our feature roadmap for upcoming features: https: pencilplanner.app roadmap If you have any questions or issues please email us at support pencilplanner.app

A minor update for you to fix several small bugs including Events not showing on first launch after selecting Allow for some users Issue some users were seeing Unable to set calendar when creating an event Calendar events not showing at all for users on Buddhist calendar A bug where sometimes writing would cause the view to move on the schedule Fixed an issue where when Finger Drawing Enabled was set to true pan wouldn t work in Navigation mode Please see our feature roadmap for upcoming features: https: pencilplanner.app roadmap If you have any questions or issues please email us at support pencilplanner.app

Added a Navigation Enabled setting while drawing we hear you! Change this setting by tapping the draw tool Fixed a couple bugs introduced with the last update We think we totally ironed out the data loss issue with this update! Faster load times for pages As a reminder here are some features from the previous update a few days ago: Added ability to create a digital calendar event Added forgot password recovery And more! Please see our feature roadmap for upcoming features: https: pencilplanner.app roadmap If you have any questions or issues please email us at support pencilplanner.app
